channel.title: Comments for Carleton History, Culture, and Commerce: Africa and Arabia

item.title: Comment on 3. The secrets of Mleiha by admin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://ocs.yorkd.sites.carleton.edu/all/uae/secrets-of-mleiha/#comment-8">tefub</a>.
Based on what I read on the walls and what was shared with us by our guide, Mleiha holds the oldest known civilization of the Arabian peninsula and is treasured by the UAE for it's archaeological value of holding artifacts some 130,000 years old.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to tefub.

Based on what I read on the walls and what was shared with us by our guide, Mleiha holds the oldest known civilization of the Arabian peninsula and is treasured by the UAE for it’s archaeological value of holding artifacts some 130,000 years old.

item.title: Comment on 3. The secrets of Mleiha by tefub
item.dc:creator: tefub
item.description: I'm kind of curious about the history of the Umm an-Nar Tomb, especially because up to 430 people could be found within this tomb. What is the cultural significance of the tomb to the people of Mleiha?
item.content:encoded: I’m kind of curious about the history of the Umm an-Nar Tomb, especially because up to 430 people could be found within this tomb. What is the cultural significance of the tomb to the people of Mleiha?

item.title: Comment on 2. Arabia at Sea! by stewardd
item.dc:creator: stewardd
item.description: Thank you for letting me travel with you to places I've never been. Not only are you a good writer, but a good photographer too! Enjoy and be safe.
item.content:encoded: Thank you for letting me travel with you to places I’ve never been. Not only are you a good writer, but a good photographer too! Enjoy and be safe.

item.title: Comment on 2. Arabia at Sea! by griffinl
item.dc:creator: griffinl
item.description: Wow! Definitely learned more about the dhow then I ever knew. And, the traders daily battle and balance for doing something good, while necessary for survival of their families. Thanks for sharing!
item.content:encoded: Wow! Definitely learned more about the dhow then I ever knew. And, the traders daily battle and balance for doing something good, while necessary for survival of their families. Thanks for sharing!

item.title: Comment on 3. The secrets of Mleiha by clayb
item.dc:creator: clayb

item.title: Comment on 3. The secrets of Mleiha by griffinl
item.dc:creator: griffinl
item.description: That is beautiful! Make sure you are not always the man behind the camera, but also that you are the man displayed on the camera! Thanks for sharing.
item.content:encoded: That is beautiful! Make sure you are not always the man behind the camera, but also that you are the man displayed on the camera! Thanks for sharing.

item.title: Comment on 1. Traveling Across the Pacific by clayb
item.dc:creator: clayb
item.description: Thanks for sharing your educational endeavors with us. It’s an awesome experience to follow you on your journey to success! Love you nephew keep reaching for the stars and the moon!
item.content:encoded: Thanks for sharing your educational endeavors with us. It’s an awesome experience to follow you on your journey to success! Love you nephew keep reaching for the stars and the moon!

item.title: Comment on A Trip Overview by griffinl
item.dc:creator: griffinl
item.description: Darryl you are educating all of us through your experience. Thank you.
item.content:encoded: Darryl you are educating all of us through your experience. Thank you.
